summary: A FedEx invoice dated December 16, 2002, detailing shipping charges for an account belonging to Jeffrey E. Epstein. The invoice lists multiple shipments sent from his New York address to various recipients, including Ghislaine Maxwell, Alan Dershowitz, and others, in November and December 2002.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: The invoice is for his FedEx account, with shipments sent from his Madison Avenue address in New York. He is the primary shipper.

persons.name: G. Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as a recipient (signed for) on multiple shipments from Epstein's account in December 2002.

persons.name: Alan Dershowitz
persons.context: Listed as a recipient on a shipment from Epstein's account delivered on December 12, 2002.

persons.name: Edwina Simmonds
persons.context: Listed as a recipient on a shipment from Epstein's account delivered on December 10, 2002.

persons.name: Murray Gell-Mann
persons.context: Listed as a recipient on a shipment from Epstein's account delivered on December 11, 2002.

persons.name: C. Snyder
persons.context: Listed as a recipient (signed for) on a shipment from Epstein's account delivered on December 13, 2002.

persons.name: B. Bonnett
persons.context: Listed as the sender on a third-party shipment billed to Epstein's account, sent from the London Fog Company.

persons.name: Nick Simmons
persons.context: Listed as the recipient on a third-party shipment billed to Epstein's account, sent to 'EPSHEN INTEREST'.

connections.description: Epstein shipped multiple packages to Maxwell, who signed for them, indicating a logistical or personal connection.
Epstein shipped a package to Dershowitz, suggesting a professional or personal connection.
Epstein shipped a package to Simmonds, who signed for it.
Epstein shipped a package to Gell-Mann.
Epstein's account was billed for a third-party shipment where Bonnett was the sender.

events.title: FedEx Shipments from Epstein
events.description: Multiple FedEx shipments were sent from Jeffrey Epstein's New York address to various recipients over approximately one month.

events.title: Invoice Issued
events.description: FedEx issued an invoice for $444.19 to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered in November and December 2002.

locations: 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022-6843 (Jeffrey Epstein's billing and shipping address)
P.O. Box 371461, Pittsburgh, PA 15250-7461 (FedEx payment address)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's FedEx account was active and used for numerous shipments in late 2002.
Recipients of packages from Epstein's account included Ghislaine Maxwell (listed as G. Maxwell) and attorney Alan Dershowitz.
The invoice shows a pattern of logistical activity and connections between Epstein and various individuals.
One shipment was billed to Epstein's account but was a third-party shipment from B. Bonnett at the London Fog Company to Nick Simmons at 'EPSHEN INTEREST'.
The document is a routine financial record that establishes Epstein's address and associates during this period.
